page.title: 19Religon
page.content: In Loughton about 7.5% of the people go to church. There are different {churches}for peoples worship such as; Church of England, Methodist, Catholic and there is also a synagogue. In Loughton we have no mosques or temples. The churches usually do something for a special time of year. At{harvest they send food to old people's homes such as Abbeyfields. Soon all the churches will get together for a {mission}where they try to get more people to go to church. Attached to some churches like St.Marys and St.Johns are{scout and {guide}troops. They attend church, go to camp and do badges for different skills. Some churches have youth groups like 'Pathfinders' and 'Fysh and chyps' who play games and listen to bible stories.
